EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Warm Greetings from Hirect
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
Your Subscription to post job on Hirect Plaform will expire on {!Opportunity.00N0w000007sy6H}, please subscribe to same or higher plan as per your necessity to continue posting jobs for your organizaation.
Hire Instantly for Your Startup.
Best Wishes {!User.Name}
